about_the_game:
Cozy Night is a camping simulator that brings comfort and coziness in the heart of the forest. Spend peaceful moments at a campsite surrounded by animal friends.

As you enjoy camping in the woods, you'll meet unique friends with their own personalities.

Roast marshmallows, light a fire, and pass the time. Soft music will play from the radio.

Enjoy the endless night, where morning never comes.
